content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Original Furnace at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position (0, 0)) with an inventory containing iron-plate.

### New Furnace at position(2, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position (2, 0)) with an inventory containing copper-plate.

### Wooden Chest at position(3.5, 0.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Chest (position (3.5, 0.5)) with an inventory containing copper-plate.

### Copper Plate Factory at position(2, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- New Furnace (position (2, 0)) with an inventory containing copper-plate.
- Assembling machine (position(z1)) and inserter (position(a)) that puts into assembling machine.
- Beltgroup (position) that connects the furnace at position (2, 0) to assembling machine at position(z1).

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting Automation Science Packs
- Ensure you have enough required sub-ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft Automation Science Packs. Specifically, make sure you have enough iron-plates and copper-plates, as they are essential for crafting iron-gear-wheels and automation science packs.

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into a furnace. For example, if you attempt to insert Copper Ore into the New Furnace, make sure you have Copper Ore available in your inventory.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors when crafting Iron Gear Wheels
- Ensure you have enough iron-plates available in your inventory before attempting to craft Iron Gear Wheels, as they are essential for this recipe.

### Errors when crafting with insufficient copper-plate
- Ensure you have enough copper-plates in your inventory before attempting to craft items that require copper-plate as a sub-ingredient.

### Errors when extracting from Wooden Chest
- Ensure that the Wooden Chest contains the item you are trying to extract. For example, you cannot extract iron-ore from a Wooden Chest if it does not contain any iron-ore.

### Errors when crafting Iron Gear Wheels due to insufficient iron-plate
- Ensure you have enough iron-plates available in your inventory before attempting to craft Iron Gear Wheels, as the recipe requires 2 iron-plates.
